entry.title: Yaki Straight Clip-Ins
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weave Got It Canada
Type: Clip In Hair Extensions
Price: 153.00 - 400.00 (21 variants)

Yaki Straight Clip-Ins

Each custom set of clip ins includes: 
Doubled wefts - they're thicker
Grip clips - Perfect for short hair
**Wide wefts - Use one wider clip in rather than many small clips

Regular Set: 100g 
Extra Volume Set: 160g 
Double set: 200g 

** All clip-ins are custom made and require 5-7 business days processing.
